title: North Korean operatives running fake job portal targeting US AI firms
description: By Sean Lyngaas, CNN (CNN) — North Korean operatives created a fake job-application platform targeting applicants to major US artificial intelligence and crypto firms as part of a new effort to steal money and know-how for the Kim Jong Un regime, researchers said on Thursday. It’s a twist on a yearslong campaign to infiltrate Fortune
content:
By Sean Lyngaas, CNN

title: Study finds AI recommendations improve emergency care decisions, but acceptance varies
description: While artificial intelligence technology is increasingly being used—formally and informally—to support medical diagnoses, its utility in emergency medical settings remains an open question. Can AI support doctors in situations where split-second decision making can mean the difference between life and death?
content: While artificial intelligence technology is increasingly being used—formally and informally—to support medical diagnoses, its utility in emergency medical settings remains an open question. Can AI support doctors in situations where split-second deci... [6438 chars]

title: Foxconn, OpenAI partner on AI hardware manufacturing
description: Foxconn will collaborate with U.S.-based OpenAI to design and engineer data center racks, components, and other artificial intelligence hardware, the Taiwanese company said on Thursday, as both firms seek to capitalize on booming demand for AI infrastructure.

title: Fox News Poll: How do voters feel about AI? It’s complicated
description: Voters hold divided opinions on artificial intelligence impact, with college-educated and higher-income Americans more optimistic than others, Fox News survey finds.
content:
As artificial intelligence becomes more integrated into daily life, voters hold mixed views about how (and when) it will shape their lives — and whether that impact will be positive.
Asked whether AI is a good thing or a bad thing across a range of a... [2303 chars]

title: ‘AI do’: S’pore wedding planners say yes to artificial intelligence in industry despite challenges
description: They say there is no replacing the critical thinking, network and emotional support that they offer. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:
SINGAPORE – Whenever soon-to-be newlyweds came to her, wedding planner Belicia Tan used to think she would have to guide them through the A to Zs of making a fairy-tale wedding come true.

title: Alphabet's Intrinsic to help bring robots to Foxconn's U.S. factories
description: Companies in the AI space are paying more attention to "physical AI," or artificial intelligence that operates in the real world.

title: Coloured sand for sale on eBay Australia removed days after asbestos contamination recall
description: The online retail platform eBay Australia told the ABC it uses artificial intelligence to stay informed of product recalls and to flag items that may be subject to a notice so they can be removed.
content:
A national recall of 32 coloured sand products that may contain asbestos has highlighted cracks in the system to remove these items from mass online marketplaces, according to one of Australia's leading specialists on artificial intelligence.
A selle... [5551 chars]

title: OpenAI taps iPhone assembler Foxconn to manufacture AI hardware in US
description: OpenAI has struck a new partnership with Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics manufacturer, to build artificial intelligence hardware.
